2GI.MU.summary: GIEAG Immobilien AG develops commercial and residential properties in southern Germany. The company develops properties in the areas of office, retail, and logistics. It also invests in residential properties. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Munich, Germany.

A4Y.DE.summary: ACCENTRO Real Estate AG, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a property company that focuses on residential properties in Germany. The company engages in the operation and trading of residential properties and individual apartments. It is involved in the retail of apartments to owner occupiers and buy-to-let investors; block sale of residential units to institutional investors; and provision of privatization services on behalf of third parties. The company was formerly known as Estavis AG and changed its name to ACCENTRO Real Estate AG in February 2015. ACCENTRO Real Estate AG was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Berlin, Germany. ACCENTRO Real Estate AG is a subsidiary of Brookline Real Estate S.Ã  r.l.

AAA.F.summary: A.A.A. Aktiengesellschaft Allgemeine Anlageverwaltung engages in the acquisition, development, rental, leasing, administration, and sale of real estate properties in Germany and internationally. The company was founded in 1890 and is based in Frankfurt am Main, Germany. A.A.A. Aktiengesellschaft Allgemeine Anlageverwaltung is a subsidiary of Rothenberger 4xS VermÃ¶gensverwaltung GmbH.

ABHA.SG.summary: Hasen-Immobilien AG engages in the real estate business. It operates in portfolio and real estate management businesses, as well as develops properties. The company is based in Augsburg, Germany.

ADL.DE.summary: ADLER is one of Germany's leading residential property companies with a focus on affordable housing. Its portfolio is primarily located in Â or on the outskirts of Â large and growing conurbations in northern, eastern and western Germany and has considerable upside potential in terms of revaluation gains, vacancy reduction and rent uplifts. All of the Group's properties and business operations are located in Germany, and benefit from the high employment in the German economy in general and also favourable real estate market dynamics in German ÂB cities'. The Group's residential portfolio has been built up over the past five years by acquiring individual portfolios or shares in property holding companies.

AGR.F.summary: AGROB Immobilien AG develops, manages, and operates commercial real estate properties in Germany. It operates a media and business park with approximately 130,000 square meters of usable space. The company also provides portfolio and property management and project development services. In addition, it operates a satellite system with various parabolic antennas and a network of fiber-optic cables. AGROB Immobilien AG was founded in 1867 and is headquartered in Ismaning, Germany.

AGR3.F.summary: AGROB Immobilien AG develops, manages, and operates commercial real estate properties in Germany. AMMN.DE.long_name: The Grounds Real Estate Development AG
AMMN.DE.summary: The Grounds Real Estate Development AG develops and manages residential properties in Germany. It engages in the trading and long-term ownership of commercial and residential properties in Germany. The company primarily develops temporary accommodation, age-appropriate housing, nursing care facilities, and hotels and holiday properties. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Berlin, Germany. The Grounds Real Estate Development AG is a subsidiary of Red Rock Wealth Management Limited.

AMMN.F.long_name: The Grounds Real Estate Development AG
AMMN.F.summary: The Grounds Real Estate Development AG develops and manages residential properties in Germany. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Berlin, Germany. The Grounds Real Estate Development AG is a subsidiary of Red Rock Wealth Management Limited.

AOX.VI.summary: alstria office REIT AG is the leading real-estate operator focusing solely on German office property in selected German markets. Our strategy is based on the ownership and an active management of our properties throughout their entire life cycle, strong added-value services to our customers and deep knowledge of the markets in which we operate. alstria strives for sustainable long-term value creation while taking advantage of short-term arbitrage of inefficiencies in the real estate markets. As of September 30, 2020, the portfolio comprises 110 buildings with a lettable area of 1.4 million square meters and a total portfolio value of EUR 4.4 billion.

AU2.F.summary: AGRARIUS AG engages in owning, buying, and leasing arable land primarily in Romania. The company manages approximately 6,500 hectares arable land. It also provides agricultural investment services, including the acquisition and management of arable land for institutional investors. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Neu-Anspach, Germany.

The company is headquartered in Lindau, Germany.

It also provides property rental services. EYEMAXX Real Estate AG was founded in 1996 and is based in Frankfurt, Germany.

DMRE.DE.summary: DEMIRE Deutsche Mittelstand Real Estate AG engages in the acquisition, management, and leasing of commercial real estate properties for medium-sized companies in Germany. It operates through two segments, Core Portfolio and Fair Value REIT. The company offers office, retail, and logistic properties. As of December 31, 2019, it had a real estate portfolio of 90 commercial properties with a rentable building space of approximately 1.1 million square meters. The company was formerly known as MAGNAT Real Estate AG and changed its name to DEMIRE Deutsche Mittelstand Real Estate AG in June 2013. DTCWY.summary: Deutsche Wohnen SE develops and manages residential properties in Germany. The company operates through four segments: Residential Property Management, Disposals, Nursing home operators, and Nursing Properties. Its property portfolio consists of approximately 164,000 residential and commercial units; nursing properties with approximately 12,200 beds; and apartments for assisted living. The company manages and markets nursing and residential care homes, as well as provides services for the care of the senior citizens. Deutsche Wohnen SE was founded in 1924 and is headquartered in Berlin, Germany.

FFM1.HM.summary: Franconofurt AG engages in the real estate business in Germany. The company acquires residential complexes and multi-family houses. Its portfolio also includes old buildings, and residential and commercial buildings, as well as hereditary/fractions of various properties. The company also focuses on converting office buildings into residential buildings. Franconofurt AG was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.

G7B.F.summary: GWB Immobilien AG engages in the planning, development, construction, rental, sale, and management of shopping and specialty retail centers primarily in medium-sized towns and suburban areas of Germany. The company's projects include shopping centers, specialty retail centers, self-service department stores, supermarkets, city-centre facilities, office buildings, and health and rehabilitation centers. Its operations comprise market research and location analysis; revitalization, consulting, project management, and marketing; building and concept planning; and facility management, such as commercial and technical infrastructure. The company, formerly known as GEG Gesellschaft fÃ¼r die Entwicklung von Discount- und Fachmarkten mbH & Co. KG, was founded in 1992 and is based in Siek, Germany. GAG.DE.summary: GORE German Office Real Estate AG engages in the real estate investment activities in Germany. It invests in office properties. The company was formerly known as Godewind Immobilien AG and changed its name to Covivio Office AG in May 2020. Covivio Office AG was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.

GWK3.HM.summary: GAG Immobilien AG develops, rents, manages, and sells affordable living spaces in Germany. It rents apartments, commercial properties, houses, garages, and parking spaces. The company was founded in 1913 and is headquartered in Cologne, Germany.

GXP1.F.summary:
GxP German Properties AG is a real estate investment firm specializing in investments in commercial real estate including office and retail real estate. The firm typically invests in major metropolitan regions within Germany, as well as in selected medium-sized German cities including Germany's metropolitan regions and selected B cities. It seeks to invest in properties that are located across Germany in cities including Berlin, Dresden, Leipzig, Erfurt, and Hanover. The firm was formerly known as Cleanventure AG and it operated as a private equity firm. GxP German Properties AG is based in Berlin, Germany. 
  As of August 31, 2018, GxP German Properties AG operates as a subsidiary of Summit Properties Limited.

HAB.VI.summary: HAMBORNER REIT AG is a public company listed in the SDAX that operates exclusively in the property sector and is positioned as a portfolio holder for high-yield commercial properties. The company generates sustainable rental income on the basis of a diversified portfolio of properties distributed throughout Germany with a total value of around Â1.6 billion. The portfolio focuses on modern office properties as well as local supply properties as large-scale retail assets, retail parks, DIY stores and attractive high street properties in major German cities and mid-sized centres. HAMBORNER REIT AG is distinguished by its many years of experience on the property and capital market, its consistent and sustainable dividend policy and its lean and transparent corporate structure. The company is a registered real estate investment trust (REIT) and benefits from corporation and trade tax exemption at company level.

IC8.DE.summary: InCity Immobilien AG invests in real estate projects in the metropolitan regions of Germany. It primarily invests in commercial properties, including office and retail space; and residential units. As of December 31, 2019, the company's portfolio included six residential and commercial buildings, and three office properties in Berlin and Frankfurt am Main. It also provides asset management and project development services for third parties. The company is based in Frankfurt am Main, Germany. InCity Immobilien AG is a subsidiary of Haron Holding S.A.

It operates hotel, commercial, and residential properties, as well as asset and funds management. Colonia Real Estate's properties include Kassel, Braunschweig, Eisenach, Cologne, Friesland, Bremen, Hamburg, Berlin portfolio, and East portfolio. LEG.DE.summary: LEG Immobilien AG operates as an integrated property company in Germany. It rents apartments, commercial units, and garages and parking spaces; and purchases and sells property portfolios. The company also offers property management and location development services; and housing industry services, as well as IT services for third parties. In addition, it generates electricity and heat. As of December 31, 2019, the company's portfolio consisted of 134,031 apartments; 1,272 commercial units; and 34,283 garages and parking spaces in North Rhine-Westphalia. LEG Immobilien AG was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Dusseldorf, Germany.

SY5N.MU.summary: Stern Immobilien AG, a real estate company, focuses on residential and commercial properties. The company's property portfolio also includes apartments and land. VNA.DE.summary: Vonovia SE operates as an integrated residential real estate company. It operates through four segments: Rental, Value-Add, Recurring Sales, and Development. The company offers property management services; apartments and property-related services; and value-added services, including maintenance and modernization of properties, craftsmen and residential environment organization, residential environment organization, condominium administration, cable TV, metering, electricity and gas supply, and insurances services. It also engages in the sale of individual condominiums and single-family houses; and project development activities. As of December 31, 2019, the company had 416,236 residential units; 138,176 garages and parking spaces; and 6,748 commercial units, as well as managed 78,691 residential units for other owners in Germany, Austria, and Sweden. The company was formerly known as Deutsche Annington Immobilien SE and changed its name to Vonovia SE in August 2015. Vonovia SE was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Bochum, Germany.

VROS.DE.summary: Verianos SE, an independent real estate merchant banking company, provides investment and advisory solutions for family offices, high net worth individuals, institutional investors, financial institutions, and fund managers. The company offers product and strategy development services; investment management services, including structuring of investment vehicles and products, devising of corporate structures, financial/ fund modelling, and controlling and reporting; capital raising and debt finance services, such as equity and debt, equity placement / capital raising for investment products, financing of assets and portfolios, and financial engineering; and transaction management services, including properties and securitized claims, sourcing and acquisition, asset due diligences, and brokerage services. It also provides asset management services, such as lease, tenant, contract, and in house asset management; and construction management services, including in house property development, feasibility studies, obtaining of planning permits, and redevelopment and refurbishment of existing properties, as well as provides financial and consultancy services. In addition, the company engages in the development and structuring of investment products, as well as the active management of the underlying assets. The company was formerly known as Verianos Real Estate AG. Verianos SE was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Cologne, Germany.

VVX.HM.summary: Palatium Real Estate AG engages in the acquisition and sale of land and buildings in Germany. It is also involved in the construction and sale of buildings for commercial or residential purposes; acquisition, management, and sale of assets of various kinds, including equity interests; and purchase and sale of precious metals and antiques. The company was formerly known as Volkmann VermÃ¶gens Verwaltungs AktienGesellschaft and changed its name to Palatium Real Estate AG in March 2016. Palatium Real Estate AG was founded in 1999 and is based in Hochspeyer, Germany.

WCMK.DE.summary: WCM Beteiligungs- und Grundbesitz-AG is a real estate investment firm. It previously operated as an international industrial company. WCM Beteiligungs- und Grundbesitz-AG was founded in 1766 and is based in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.

WCMK.F.summary: WCM Beteiligungs- und Grundbesitz-AG is a real estate investment firm. It previously operated as an international industrial company. WCM Beteiligungs- und Grundbesitz-AG was founded in 1766 and is based in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.

WCMK.VI.summary: WCM Beteiligungs- und Grundbesitz-AG is a real estate investment firm. It previously operated as an international industrial company. WCM Beteiligungs- und Grundbesitz-AG was founded in 1766 and is based in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.

WEG1.DE.summary: Westgrund AG (DB:WEG1) is a real estate investment holding. Through its subsidiaries it focuses on investments in residential properties with 50 to 1,000 units and offers estate agent as well as property management services. The firm also seeks to acquire housing companies, estate agents, project development firms as well as real estate asset managers. Its geographical focus is Germany. The firm was founded in 1990 and is based in Remscheid, Germany. As of June 23, 2015, Westgrund Aktiengesellschaft operates as a subsidiary of ADLER Real Estate Aktiengesellschaft.

YMO.F.summary: YMOS AG develops and leases real estate properties. The company is based in Obertshausen, Germany. YMOS AG operates as a subsidiary of CURA Kurkliniken, Seniorenwohn- und Pflegeheime GmbH.
